name: Holon’s Magnemite
effect: You may attach this as an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon. While attached, this card is a Special Energy card and provides {C} Energy.
author: Katsura Tabata

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
